name: Heavy Truck Offroad Racing
description:
Then, "Heavy Truck Offroad Racing" is a fascinating off-road race for you! Sit down at the wheel of one of the four legendary all-terrain vehicles. Test yourself for strength on various routes of increased complexity. Dirt, marshes, flooded lowlands, dangerous slopes, ruts, windbreaks, all this and more await you on the way to victory. Feel the power of the domestic car industry . The change of the time of day will add even greater acuity to the sensations from passing this or that site. Dive headlong into the world of extreme racing.
Features:
Excellent, modern graphics.
User-friendly interface and management.
The fleet consists of domestic all-terrain vehicles.
Physics takes into account all the unevenness of roads, which makes the behavior of cars as realistic as possible.
Ability to switch between different types of drives.
A wide range of routes and opportunities for their passage.
